channel.title: Rrdtool on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: RRDTool v1.5.4 on Raspberry Pi
item.description: The second in a series of efforts to get a suitable database for the task. The challenge is that there’s a lot of data out there that changes all the time, and you want to gather it, make sure it’s sane, squirrel it away for later analysis, put together a pretty chart so that you can spot check it, feed it into other systems not yet fully dreamed of to cause actions, and so on.
